items.title: Collaborative Task Management
items.description: Enable users to create, assign, and track tasks within a team environment.
acceptance_criteria: Users can create tasks with title, description, due date, and assignee
Team members can view all tasks assigned to them or their team
Tasks can be updated and status changes are visible to all team members in real time
non_functional: System should support at least 100 concurrent users without performance degradation
Task updates should propagate to all clients within 2 seconds

notes: Assumed requirement includes real-time updates and basic task attributes; user did not specify platforms or integrations.
